name: None of Your Zombusiness
description:
Swap between players and plan ahead to fight against incoming waves of zombies in the dark. Strategise and place your characters to make the most of their abilities, and last as long as you can!

Use number keys to switch characters

Caution! The volume might be a bit loud!

Made for the Brackets Game Jam 2021-1

Developer, Programmer - Josh

Designers - Harry, Oliver, Andrew

Music - swirlybird242, Travis
